hero.title: Mosala Ubuntu
hero.subtitle: Ordinateur ya liboso ya IA ya bokoko na Afrika
hero.description: Na nguya ya Inga Falls, tozali kotonga ba-infrastructures ya IA oyo ekosalela Afrika liboso—na polele, na ngonga, mpe na mitindo ya Kongo na kati.

vision.title: Emoniseli na biso
vision.subtitle: Kotonga mikolo ya IA na Afrika
vision.mission: Kokela ba-infrastructures ya IA ya bokoko oyo esalemi na nguya ya moto ya solo, kosalela bamposa ya Afrika liboso ntango ezali kopesa courant na bato milioni.

sovereignty.title: Bokonzi ya numérique
sovereignty.description: Infrastructures ya IA ya Afrika, eyangemi na Afrika

transparency.title: Polele makasi
transparency.description: Misala ya polele, mikano oyo ekoki kotalama, ngonga na liboso ya bato

community.title: Lisanga liboso
community.description: Bamposa ya esika ezali kotambwisa ba-priorités na biso

sustainability.title: Nguya ya mabele
sustainability.description: 100% nguya hydroélectrique ya moto ya solo uta na Inga Falls

blueprint.title: Manaka ya technique
blueprint.subtitle: Architecture ya nguya tii na ba-calculs
blueprint.caption: Boyokani ya kosomba courant (PPA) ya 500MW ezali anchor ya mbongo oyo ekomisa extension mobimba ya Inga 3 viable économiquement.

inga.label: Inga Falls
inga.description: Makasi ya nguya hydroélectrique ya monene koleka na mokili

ppa.label: Station Ubuntu
ppa.description: Déclencheur financier mpe anchor ya infrastructure

compute.label: Supercalculateur IA
compute.description: Nguya ya calcul ya 10+ Exaflops FP16

grid.label: Réseau ya zone
grid.description: Électrification na nzela ya capacité ya kozongisa

power.label: Esika ya nguya
power.value: Hydroélectricité ya fil de l'eau (Extension Inga 3)

cooling.label: Kopola
cooling.value: Refroidissement liquide en boucle fermée na exchange thermique ya fleuve Congo

compute.label: Objectif ya calcul
compute.value: 10+ Exaflops (FP16) etali na formation LLM mpo na nkota ya Afrika

connectivity.label: Connexion
connectivity.value: Liaison fibre ya térabit na Kinshasa mpe ba-câbles sous-marins na nzela ya Muanda

philosophy.title: Bwanya Ubuntu
philosophy.subtitle: Nazali mpo tozali
philosophy.description: Ndenge na biso ya kotala IA ezali na mizinda ya bwanya ya Afrika Ubuntu—kotia ntina na lisanga, bomoto ya kosangana, mpe bokóli ya bato banso.

community.title: Kati na lisanga
community.description: Mikano eza na bolingo ya bolamu ya bato banso na esika ya litomba ya moto moko

transparency.title: Misala ya polele
transparency.description: Misala nyonso ekoki kotalama mpe ezali na ngonga ya liboso

respect.title: Botosi ya mimeseno
respect.description: Kopesa lokumu na mitindo, bokonzi, mpe mimeseno ya Kongo

sustainability.title: Makanisi ya tango molai
sustainability.description: Kotonga mpo na ba-générations, kasi te mpo na ba-trimestres

agents.title: Système ya ba-agents IA
agents.subtitle: Automatisation ya mayele na botali ya batu
agents.description: Ba-agents 8 ya IA oyo bamesengo balandaka mibeko, balandaka bokóli, mpe basalisaka misala—nyonso na examen obligatoire ya moto.

policy.name: Moniteur ya mibeko
policy.description: Ezali kolanda ba-réglementations ya gouvernement RDC

narrative.name: Mobimisi ya makambu
narrative.description: Ezali kokela ba-mises à jour ya polele

chatbot.name: Inga GPT
chatbot.description: Ezali kopesa nzela na mituna-biyano ya liboso

policy.title: Ba-mises à jour ya mibeko
policy.subtitle: Ba-réglementations ya gouvernement RDC oyo ezali kosala impact na mosala

contact.title: Pesa biso sango
contact.subtitle: Yangana na biso
contact.description: Ozali na mituna na ntina ya Mosala Ubuntu? Tolingi koyoka yo.

footer.tagline: Kotonga révolution ya infrastructures IA ya Afrika
footer.poweredBy: Na nguya ya hydroélectricité ya Inga
